TextLibrary.Text: We have received a distress call from a ship. They say they are being attacked by Pirates.
We have received a distress call from a ship. They say they are being attacked by Pirates.
We should go help them. Maybe they know something about this creature we're tracking. Where are they?
We should go help them. Maybe they know something about this creature we're tracking. Where are they?
They are in orbit around Asteroid SR758W.
They are in orbit around Asteroid SR758W.
